abstract: In anticipation of a crucial vote at next month’s annual meeting, board members are said to be planning to meet with some of the bank’s biggest shareholders to make their case that JPMorgan’s influential chief executive, Jamie Dimon, should keep his chairman title.

lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase is working behind the scenes to avert a major potential embarrassment.

headline.main: JPMorgan Works to Avert Split of Chief and Chairman Roles
headline.print_headline: JPMorgan Works to Avert a Split of the Chief and Chairman Roles

byline.original: By Susanne Craig and Jessica Silver-Greenberg
